events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your submitted resume and cover letter.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for a software developer role requiring backend and DevOps experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be in touch soon to discuss the next steps and answer any initial questions you may have.
You completed the initial screening successfully. The recruiter was impressed with your background in software development and your familiarity with DevOps tools.
Thank you for responding promptly to our interview scheduling request. You confirmed availability for the technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 22nd. You will be evaluated on your software engineering skills including coding and system design.
You successfully completed the technical interview. The interviewers appreciated your problem-solving approach and depth of knowledge in backend systems.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 28th. This session will focus on your cultural fit and discuss benefits as well as company policies.
You completed the HR interview and had a positive discussion about your career goals, company values, and compensation expectations.
We are pleased to propose you an official job offer for the software engineer role. Please review the details and let us know your decision.
Thank you for your feedback on the offer. We're glad to hear you find the terms acceptable and look forward to your decision.
You have accepted our job offer for the software engineer position. Welcome aboard! We are excited to have you join the Engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started. You will receive access to necessary tools, meet your team, and complete orientation over the next two weeks.
The hiring process for this position is now closed. Congratulations once again on your new role and best wishes for your success with the company.
